# Government Tender Announcement

## Hard Drives for the Department of National Defence

### Solicitation No. 2BH2127621/A

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of 2.5" 4TB Hard Drives. The solicitation includes 60 firm deliverables and 120 client options.

#### Key Requirements

* The hard drives must be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario
* The delivery date is 60 federal government working days from the contract award
* Comprehensive land claim agreements do not apply
* The security requirements are not applicable

#### Contracting Information

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract
* Interested suppliers must access the solicitation and submit their bid through the Shared Services Canada website at [https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login](https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login)
* All documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada

#### Contact Information

* Colin McKennirey, Procurement Officer
* Shared Services Canada
* 400 Cooper Street, 6th Floor
* PO Box/CP 9808 STS T CSC
* Ottawa, Ontario K2P 4N1
* Telephone: 343-572-8718
* Email: [colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:colin.mckennirey@ssc-spc.gc.ca)

#### Tender Closing Date and Time

* Date: December 14, 2022
* Time: 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

### Related Documents

The tender package includes the following documents:

* Amendment 001 to the RFP
* List of Deliverables
* Request for Quotation
* Other relevant documents

Note: The complete tender package can be accessed through the Shared Services Canada website. Interested suppliers must carefully review the documents to ensure compliance with all requirements.

### Contract Awards

The contract will be awarded based on the evaluation of the responsive bids received. The Crown may negotiate the terms of the contract with the successful bidder.
